message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with video-based person re-identification, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves deep learning techniques, which makes cs.MM (Multimedia) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely sub-categories. The paper proposes a novel layer to capture appearance and motion dynamics in full-length videos, which involves attention mechanisms, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed method on benchmark datasets, which involves performance evaluation, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category.
